title: Arrival of the Book Caravan at the Farmington Village Library and The Spring Meeting of the CT Library Association
creator: The Farmington Vallery Herald
description: Newspaper article announcing the arrival of the Book Caravan at the Farmington Village Library.  The Book Caravan is a traveling bookshop conducted bt the Women's Educational and Industrial Union of Boston and its Bookshop for Boys and Girls.  Another newspaper article announcing the spring meeting of the Connecticut Library Association to be held at the Farmington Village Library on Friday, May 27th, 1921 at 10 am.
